content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 5, Leicester City 2.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 5, Leicester City 2.
Goal!  Chelsea 5, Leicester City 2. Raul Meireles (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Fernando Torres following a fast break.
Attempt blocked. Lloyd Dyer (Leicester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jeffrey Schlupp.
Attempt blocked. Jermaine Beckford (Leicester City) left footed shot from very close range is blocked. Assisted by David Nugent with a headed pass.
Goal!  Chelsea 4, Leicester City 2. Ben Marshall (Leicester City) right footed shot from outside the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Jermaine Beckford.
Offside, Chelsea. Gary Cahill tries a through ball, but Fernando Torres is caught offside.
Goal!  Chelsea 4, Leicester City 1. Fernando Torres (Chelsea) header from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Raul Meireles with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Ben Marshall.
Attempt blocked. Fernando Torres (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Florent Malouda.
Substitution, Leicester City. Ben Marshall replaces Richie Wellens.
Foul by Paul Konchesky (Leicester City).
Daniel Sturridge (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Lee Peltier (Leicester City) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Neil Danns with a cross following a corner.

Goal!  Chelsea 3, Leicester City 1. Jermaine Beckford (Leicester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top left corner.

Substitution, Chelsea. David Luiz replaces Branislav Ivanovic.
Offside, Chelsea. Michael Essien tries a through ball, but Daniel Sturridge is caught offside.
